"""
http://www.codechef.com/problems/RESN04
"""

import sys

#N = 10
#piles = [1]
result = []

T = int(sys.stdin.readline())
for t in xrange(T):
  sys.stdin.readline()
  piles = sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()
  count = 0
  for i in xrange(1,len(piles)+1):
    count += int(piles[i-1]) / i

  if count % 2: #even
    result.append('ALICE')
  else:
    result.append('BOB')

for i in result:
  print i
